title: Alliance Francaise (Learn French)
description:
Alliance Francaise with CLE International, presents the digital learning method of the French language called:


Echo Numerique


Details:

Echo - Digital version complete
(Echo A1 - Echo A2 - Echo B1 volume 1 - Echo B1 volume 2 - Echo B2)

All levels have a digital version to modulate and perform a dynamic learning in the classroom. The Echo collection can be used by the students as a simple digital solution, while at the same time be flexible and complete for the teacher:

    No installation required (Mac / PC)

    Compatible with TBI

    Can also be used in simple projection video or computer (Mac / PC)

    To use in the classroom or to prepare the course

    All components of the inclusive method (Student's Book, Teacher's Book, Workbook personal learning, Study Guide, Assessment File)

    Direct access to all content and media (pages, images, audio, video, interactive exercises)

    Linear or custom navigation

    Many tools and features



Size: 1.9GB


Requirements:

Windows XP/Vista/7/8
Mac OS X PPC/Intel
Linux

Adobe Flash Player
Adobe Shockwave Player


Instructions:

No installation required (Portable)
Unzip and run (7z file extension)
